Element-wise truth value of (x > y).

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/greater"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.greater</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/greater"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.greater</code></a>


``` python
tf.keras.backend.greater(
    x,
    y
)
```
